data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 442,200 citizens of the the state of Krabi.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Krabi, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Krabi, Thailand the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Over 98.69 percent of the people of Krabi are far from Jesus.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Krabi.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Krabi hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 442,200 citizens of Krabi, Thailand, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary:
the state of Krabi, Thailand has a population of 442,200.

We estimate Krabi has 2,859 people who might know Jesus, 2,919 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 436,422 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Krabi that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
